version.title: fields_for with index on nested attributes collection

version.body:
I was doing something wrong. The right option is child_index, not index.
I think this should be documented, or at least mentioned as an allowed option. Propositions:
* https://github.com/piglop/rails/commit/e328c90e36016f2599f8d62c9407f4490177fa8c * https://github.com/piglop/rails/commit/aadc9d8629964bc87be5cb6614711cd8f967e1ed
